DOC.brief_summary: An agreement has been made to conduct a post-approval commitment study that provides supplementary information relating to the use of XiapexÂ® as well as other non-pharmacological treatments for Dupuytren's contracture by health care professionals in a real world clinical setting.
DOC.detailed_description: phase 4, open label, multi-center, prospective non-interventional descriptive
DOC.criteria: Adults with a palpable cord eligible for the treatment of Dupuytren's contracture
